Subject: Broken Inheritance Job fails to run.
Description:
Broken Inheritance Analysis job started to run for longer than usual and eventually times out. Looking at the logs, it seems like the job gets stuck at the same task and stops processing data until it gets aborted by the timeout.
This task used to take 2 hours and 30 minutest in the beginning, but suddenly started to take 20+ hours and now its running for 40+ hours before timing out.
Solution_Comment__c:
[Issue]
The BrokenInheritance report went from taking less than 3 hours to over 40 hours when they added scanning of workstations

[Resolution]
We scoped the 3. Determine Permission Changes analysis & 4. Analyze Trustee Differences to just the file server in the SQL script by adding a WHERE clause when joining the FSAA_Hosts table
